name: Stone Skip
description:
Stone Skip

The volcano is erupting! Charge up and skip your stone across the lava as far as possible by timing your skips to maintain speed.  Can you reach the biggest ship?

Keyboard Controls
  • Spacebar (Charging State): Power Bar Timing
  • Spacebar (Skipping State): Bounce on Lava Timing

If the game appears cropped, we recommend widening your browser or using the fullscreen button in the bottom right corner!

Credits

Game developed as part of the GDA Microgame Jam.
Originally published on September 26, 2021
